description: Modify the configuration to connect with a remote LDAP service to authenticate the load balancer users.

host.description: it is the LDAP URL or the server IP

port.description: it is the port where the LDAP server is listening. This filed is skipt if the host is a URL or overwrite the port

bind_dn.description: it is the LDAP admin user used to modify manage. It is not necessary if the LDAP can be queried anonimously

bind_password.description: it is the password for the admin user

base_dn.description: it is used to get an user based on some attribute

filter.description: it is the base used to look for the user in the LDAP

version.description: it is the LDAP version used by the server

scope.description: the search scope, can be base, one or sub, defaults to sub

timeout.description: timeout of the LDAP query to the server
